welcome_message_body: Welcome to Garfield Heights, a charming city known for its friendly locals and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport is dedicated to handling private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
